title: Herbal Extracts Loaded-Nanocarriers to Skin Disease Treatment
details: RM LUCINDA-SILVA, A MALHEIROS, ACF DA ROCHA… - Novel Nanocarriers for Skin …, 2025
abstract: Medicinal plants are considered a repository of numerous types of bioactive compounds that have various therapeutic properties. In recent decades, many scientific studies have directed the search for medicinal plants as a source of drugs …
